definition: exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: He set an example of wholehearted service to the people.
sentences.chinese: 他是全心全意为人民服务的表率。

sentences.english: His citation says he showed outstanding and exemplary courage.
sentences.chinese: 颁给他的嘉奖令称他表现出非凡的勇气，堪为表率。

sentences.english: Leadership means showing the way by example.
sentences.chinese: 领导就意味着起表率作用。

sentences.english: They try to use her as leverage to make her submit to their will.
sentences.chinese: 他们试图用她做表率，要让她屈服于他们的意志。

sentences.english: We need to cry foul, require change, and start leading the charge ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要痛定思痛，要求变革，并首先自己做好表率。

sentences.english: After all, civil servants should serve as examples for the nation, not taking the lead in committing illegal acts.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟公务员应作为全国表率，不该带头违法。

sentences.english: They should become a model replicable to students on a basis of self-disciplining.
sentences.chinese: 要以正己为基础，成为学生的表率。

sentences.english: He always comported himself in an exemplary manner .
sentences.chinese: 他的行为举止始终可为人表率。

sentences.english: In fact, the automobile market makes a good example.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，汽车市场做了很好的表率。

sentences.english: Due diligence work classes, students can play in the play a leading role.
sentences.chinese: 班级工作尽心尽责，在同学中能起到表率作用。

sentences.english: The speculator specificnumjust ber one ingly specified the specific of this species specimen.
sentences.chinese: 投机者特地指定了这种物种标本的表率。

definition: to set an example (idiom); to serve as a model
to be strict with oneself (idiom)/to demand a lot of oneself
subordinates follow the example of their superiors (idiom)
to be duty bound/to be one's unshirkable responsibility
(to play) one's part/one's role/one's duty/(to stay within) one's bounds/dutiful/keeping to one's role
to share tribulations/to help sb with worries and difficulties
(idiom) one's actions are in keeping with what one says
to take the big picture into consideration (idiom)/to work for the benefits of all
